# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a share from a serialized instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **aDecoder**: The coder to use when deserializing the share.

## Discussion

When saving a newly created [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare], you must save the share and its [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/Metadata/rootRecord] in the same [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordsOperation] batch.

## Creating a Share

- **init(rootRecord:)**: Creates a new share for the specified record.
- **init(rootRecord:shareID:)**: Creates a new share for the specified record and record ID.
- **init(recordZoneID:)**: Creates a new share for the specified record zone.
